question: Comet Hyakutake orbits the sun every 60 years. Noah's uncle saw the Comet when he was 22 years old. Noah saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his uncle was when he saw the Comet. How old was Noah when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Noah saw the Comet for the second time when he was 22 years * 3= <<22*3=66>>66 years old.
Comet Hyakutake can be seen every 60 years, so Noah saw the comet for the first time when he was 66 years - 60 years = <<66-60=6>>6 years old.
#### 6
